participant_1.background:
I don't let my busy schedule get in the way of my relationships with others.
I moved to work for an organization that better aligns with my values.
I'm going to be writing in my journal and reflecting on my past.
I make jokes to cheer myself up.
I just finished a long ride on my favorite horse.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy running and skateboarding to stay active and clear my head.
i prefer vinyl records to any other music recording format.
I get to work on a new project every day with the love of my life.
i wish my boyfriend didn t want an open relationship.
I like to take my time driving through the countryside and listening to music.

content.text: It was good! Got to work on a new project with my boyfriend, and I took a nice drive in the countryside.
That sounds like a lot of fun! What are you working on?
We're creating a new video game. It's a lot of work, but it's also really fun.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to create my own video game.
You should! It's a lot of work, but it's really rewarding.
I might have to give it a try. What kind of music do you like to listen to while you're driving?
I like to listen to a lot of different kinds of music, but I really love vinyl records. I think they sound so much better than digital music.
I've never really been into vinyl records, but I can see why people like them.
Yeah, they're definitely a different experience.
So what are you up to for the rest of the day?
I'm not sure yet. I might go for a run or skateboard. I'm not sure what my boyfriend has planned.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun things to do. I'm jealous!
Thanks! I'm lucky to have such a great life
